attributes.action: Get Michael Jackson Playing Live Shows And Writing Music Again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Me And Many More Alike Michael Jackson Was Our Childhood/Adulthood Hero In Music , As Most Of Us Know He's "died out" I Would Like Him To Show All These "big bands" What BIG Really Means
So Please Sign My Petition 
Thanks Gav

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
